name: 2024 The 17th International Conference on Advanced Computer Theory and Engineering
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by program committees and technical committee, and accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE after registration and presentation. The proceedings will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore and indexed by Ei Compendex & Scopus.
organizers: Anhui Jianzhu University and IEEE Hefei Subsection
